    • Method Detail

      • setRecordConverterClass

        public static void setRecordConverterClass(org.apache.hadoop.mapred.JobConf conf,
                           Class<?> klass)
        A ThriftRecordConverter builds an object by working with TProtocol. The default implementation creates standard Apache Thrift TBase objects; to support alternatives, such as Twiter's Scrooge, a custom converter can be specified (for example, ScroogeRecordConverter from parquet-scrooge).
